poemsDataJson.list_full: 奥山(おくやま)に 紅葉(もみぢ)踏(ふ)み分(わ)け 鳴(な)く鹿(しか)の 声(こゑ)聞(き)く時(とき)ぞ 秋(あき)は悲(かな)しき
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: In the mountain depths,//Treading through the crimson leaves,//The wandering stag calls.//When I hear the lonely cry,//Sad (how sad!) the autumn is.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Oku-yama ni|Momiji fumi wake|Naku shika no|Koe kiku toki zo|Aki wa kanashiki
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: こゑきくときそ あきはかなしき
poemsDataJson.author: 猿丸大夫(さるまるだゆう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 暮れてゆく秋山の寂寥と哀感
